description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Doppelganger is an adrenaline filled 2d side scrolling shooter.  Save the astronauts from the evil alien invaders!  Play 2 worlds simultaneously in a test of dexterity and courage!!!
description.short: Doppelganger is an adrenaline filled 2d side scrolling shooter.  Save the astronauts from the evil alien invaders!  Play 2 worlds simultaneously in a test of dexterity and courage!!!
